alert.note: Alert for Pike; Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 29 at 3:59PM CST until November 29 at 4:30PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN WALTHALL AND NORTHEASTERN PIKE COUNTIES... At 358 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ruth, or 11 miles northeast of Mccomb, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Walthall and northeastern Pike Counties. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for southern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
